name: Wristlet - Clutch - Floral Print - Ruffle
description:
Carry your items in style this summer with this adorable ruffled wristlet. Ruffles are pressed and secured into place. This wristlet can easily accommodate a cell phone, keys, a small wallet for cards, chapstick, lotion, even a checkbook and pen. 

Not a wristlet type of girl? Pop it in your tote to carry around smaller items that get lost in larger bags or use it for your cosmetics.

Measurements:
8" wide.
6.5" tall.

name: Wristlet - Clutch - Japanese Goldfish - Lotus Flower
description:
Carry your items in style this summer with this adorable ruffled wristlet. Ruffles are pressed and secured into place by being sewn into the seam. This wristlet can easily accommodate a combination of the following: cell phone, keys, a small wallet, chapstick, lotion, even a checkbook and pen. 

Not a wristlet type of girl? Pop it in your tote to carry around smaller items that get lost in larger bags or to keep your cosmetics.

Measurements:
9.75" wide.
5" tall.

Made with 100% cotton fabric outside and inside.
Interlining is polyester fusible fleece.

name: Small Purse - Large Wristlet - Knitting Project Bag
description:
This peacock fabric from the Monaco line by Dena makes for a great summer bag! Lined with the coordinating striped fabric from the same line, this bag is a great way to stash your keys, wallet, cell phone, and other must-haves for running errands and having fun with friends. Sized just so for holding what you need without being so big that items can get "lost" inside. No interior pockets needed on this particular bag! Slide the longer handle through the shorter handle to keep it closed, carry it in your hand or over your wrist like a wristlet. 

**A customer who purchased one of these bags from me elsewhere mentioned that she uses this bag for kitting projects, particularly socks!

Measurements:
12" across at widest point.
8.5" from center of opening to bottom. 

Fabric: 100% cotton.
Interlining: Polyester fusible fleece.
